articles.title: Olympics: Swimmer calls for expulsion of junta-led Myanmar from Games - CNA
articles.description: MELBOURNE: A leading Myanmar swimmer has called for an international boycott of his country's Olympic committee, branding it a "puppet" of the southeast Asian nation's military rulers.

articles.title: Asia's obsession with food and beauty has a dark side - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: AT A RECENT doctor’s visit, my endocrinologist admonished me for gaining two pounds. “You’re not obese” — I’m not even close — “but it’s something to watch,” he told me.

articles.title: NGOs call on ADB to end fossil fuel loans amid climate reboot - BusinessWorld Online
articles.description: TOKYO — A group of non-governmental organizations called on the Asian Development Bank (ADB) on Monday to end loans to the fossil-fuels sector, as the international lender holds its annual meeting this week with a focus on a green economic recovery.
